LayoutNode.Content: Secondary School of Mathematics, Varna, Bulgaria (2001 -- 2007)
Top of the year in BA (2010)
Top of the year in MCompSci (2011)
Strong background in Mathematics and Informatics olympiads
LayoutNode.SRC: <LI>Strong background in Mathematics and Informatics olympiads
